Texts.Chs: 现在，你应该已经明白提取DNA的基础步骤了，那么接下来在^orange;生化实验台^reset;中提取一些^orange;DNA样本^reset;吧。在迈向成功的路上，他们的^green;必要性^reset;不言而喻。
Texts.Eng: Now that the basics are clear to you, try making some ^orange;DNA Samples^reset; in the ^orange;BioChem Lab^reset;. They will prove ^green;essential^reset; to your success.

Texts.Chs: 少了DNA，将会使你的细胞研究毫无进展，更别说创造物种、改造生命了。所以多准备一些吧！
Texts.Eng: Without DNA, you'll have a hard time doing much xenobiology. You can't create or modify life without this resource. Stockpile it!
